titles.title: Federal Service Priority Placement Program Act of 1995
To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the establishment of priority placement programs for Federal employees affected by a reduction in force, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 7/20/1995--Introduced. Federal Service Priority Placement Program Act of 1995 - Amends Federal civil service law to mandate a Government-wide priority placement program, as well as agency-wide programs, for Federal employees affected by a reduction in force.
